About the Event

Shaping the future of Artificial Intelligence in India and beyond.

Our Vision

To position India as a global powerhouse in Artificial Intelligence by fostering innovation, collaboration, and ethical AI development that solves real-world challenges.

Our Mission

To bring together the brightest minds, industry leaders, and policymakers to create a roadmap for a "Viksit Bharat" powered by AI, ensuring inclusive growth and technological sovereignty.

₹1 Trillion+
AI Economy Potential

India’s AI Opportunity

India is at the cusp of an AI revolution. With a massive digital infrastructure, a young and tech-savvy population, and a supportive government policy framework, the nation is poised to lead the Global South in AI adoption.

The Bharat AI Innovation event serves as the catalyst for this transformation, connecting the dots between research, industry application, and policy governance.
